Quote: Man must form a clear and definite mental image of the things he wishes to have, to do, or to become; and he must hold this mental image in his thoughts, while being deeply grateful to the Supreme that all his desires are granted to him.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Use your mind to form a mental image of what you want, and to hold that vision with faith and purpose; and use your will to keep your mind working in the Right Way.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Form your clear mental vision of what you want, and begin to act with faith and purpose.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: In order to do this, man must pass from the competitive to the creative mind; he must form a clear mental picture of the things he wants, and hold this picture in his thoughts with the fixed PURPOSE to get what he wants, and the unwavering FAITH that he does get what he wants, closing his mind to all that may tend to shake his purpose, dim his vision, or quench his faith.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: To understand the science of getting rich is therefore the most essential of all knowledge.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The men and women who practice the foregoing instructions will certainly get rich; and the riches they receive will be in exact proportion to the definiteness of their vision, the fixity of their purpose, the steadiness of their faith, and the depth of their gratitude.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The individual worker, however, is not held down by the ignorance or the mental slothfulness of his class; he can follow the tide of opportunity to riches, and this book will tell him how.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Individuals may enter upon the Certain Way at any time, and under any government, and make themselves rich; and when any considerable number of individuals do so under any government, they will cause the system to be so modified as to open the way for others.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: So let wage-earning men and women study this book with great care, and enter with confidence upon the course of action it prescribes; it will not fail.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is inherent in the constitution of the cosmos that all things shall be for him and work together for his good; and he must certainly get rich if he acts and thinks in the Certain Way.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: In order to do this, man must pass from the competitive to the creative mind; otherwise he cannot be in harmony with the Formless Intelligence, which is always creative and never competitive in spirit.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The man who wishes to get rich must spend his leisure hours in contemplating his Vision, and in earnest thanksgiving that the reality is being given to him.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Do all the work you can do, every day, and do each piece of work in a perfectly successful manner; put the power of success, and the purpose to get rich, into everything that you do.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: By continuous contemplation you will get the picture of what you want, even to the smallest details, so firmly fixed upon your mind, and so completely transferred to the mind of Formless Substance, that in your working hours you need only to mentally refer to the picture to stimulate your faith and purpose, and cause your best effort to be put forth.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Every man who becomes rich by competition throws down behind him the ladder by which he rises, and keeps others down; but every man who gets rich by creation opens a way for thousands to follow him, and inspires them to do so.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If the people have the Advancing Mind, have the Faith that they can become rich, and move forward with the fixed purpose to become rich, nothing can possibly keep them in poverty.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Hold the vision of yourself in the job you want, while you ACT with faith and purpose on the job you have, and you will certainly get the job you want.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Go over your desires just as the man I have described went over his house; see just what you want, and get a clear mental picture of it as you wish it to look when you get it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: All that is included in his mental image will surely be brought to the man who follows the instructions given above, and whose faith does not waver.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It contains all you need to know of the science of getting rich; and you will find all the essentials summed up in the following chapter.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is a natural law that like causes always produce like effects; and, therefore, any man or woman who learns to do things in this certain way will infallibly get rich.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Original Substance wants to live all that is possible in you, and wants you to have all that you can or will use for the living of the most abundant life.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: To think health when surrounded by the appearances of disease, or to think riches when in the midst of appearances of poverty, requires power; but he who acquires this power becomes a MASTER MIND.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The ownership of money and property comes as a result of doing things in a certain way; those who do things in this Certain Way, whether on purpose or accidentally, get rich; while those who do not do things in this Certain Way, no matter how hard they work or how able they are, remain poor.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The man who owns all he wants for the living of all the life he is capable of living is rich; and no man who has not plenty of money can have all he wants.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Your thought makes all things, animate and inanimate, work to bring you what you want; but your personal activity must be such that you can rightly receive what you want when it reaches you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Doing what you want to do is life; and there is no real satisfaction in living if we are compelled to be forever doing something which we do not like to do, and can never do what we want to do.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You want to get rich in order that you may eat, drink, and be merry when it is time to do these things; in order that you may surround yourself with beautiful things, see distant lands, feed your mind, and develop your intellect; in order that you may love men and do kind things, and be able to play a good part in helping the world to find truth.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You will be able from day to day to make larger combinations, secure greater advantages, and to go on into a more congenial vocation if you desire to do so.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Some environments may be more favorable than others, but when two men in the same business are in the same neighborhood, and one gets rich while the other fails, it indicates that getting rich is the result of doing things in a Certain Way.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: There is no such thing possible in this universe as a lack of opportunities for the man who is living the advancing life.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: These will show others the way, and inspire them with a desire for real life, with the faith that it can be attained, and with the purpose to attain it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: When we realize this, we lose all doubt and fear, for we know that we can create what we want to create; we can get what we want to have, and can become what we want to be.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Man can remain upon the creative plane only by uniting himself with the Formless Intelligence through a deep and continuous feeling of gratitude.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Whenever you find yourself hurrying, call a halt; fix your attention on the mental image of the thing you want, and begin to give thanks that you are getting it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If you are ever to begin to make ready for the reception of what you want, you must begin now.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Imagine an environment, and a financial condition exactly as you want them, and live all the time in that imaginary environment and financial condition.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: There is a Power, which never fails to present opportunity to the Advancing Man who is moving in obedience to law.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: No possible combination of circumstances can defeat a man or woman who is proceeding to get rich along strictly scientific lines.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Your business will increase rapidly, and you will be surprised at the unexpected benefits which will come to you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You will see that it is a self-evident proposition that if you do not do any inefficient acts, and if you do a sufficient number of efficient acts, you will become rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The scientific use of thought consists in forming a clear and distinct mental image of what you want; in holding fast to the purpose to get what you want; and in realizing with grateful faith that you do get what you want.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Success in life is becoming what you want to be; you can become what you want to be only by making use of things, and you can have the free use of things only as you become rich enough to buy them.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The grateful mind is constantly fixed upon the best; therefore it tends to become the best; it takes the form or character of the best, and will receive the best.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You can make each act a success, because ALL Power is working with you; and ALL Power cannot fail.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If you fix upon your consciousness the fact that the desire you feel for the possession of riches is one with the desire of Omnipotence for more complete expression, your faith becomes invincible.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The various faculties of your mind are the tools with which you must do the work which is to make you rich; it will be easier for you to succeed if you get into a business for which you are well equipped with mental tools.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Every person naturally wants to become all that they are capable of becoming; this desire to realize innate possibilities is inherent in human nature; we cannot help wanting to be all that we can be.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: For the present, however, it is enough to know that neither the government under which you live nor the capitalistic or competitive system of industry can keep you from getting rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If you neglect this study, you are derelict in your duty to yourself, to God and humanity; for you can render to God and humanity no greater service than to make the most of yourself.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Man's right to life means his right to have the free and unrestricted use of all the things which may be necessary to his fullest mental, spiritual, and physical unfoldment; or, in other words, his right to be rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Man is a thinking center, capable of original thought; if man can communicate his thought to original thinking substance, he can cause the creation, or formation, of the thing he thinks about.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The object of all life is development; and everything that lives has an inalienable right to all the development it is capable of attaining.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is the desire of God that you should get rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Begin this way of thinking and acting, and your faith and purpose will make you quick to see any opportunity to better your condition.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If one man who reads this book gets rich by doing what it tells him to do, that is evidence in support of my claim; but if every man who does what it tells him to do gets rich, that is positive proof until some one goes through the process and fails.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: And he must do, every day, all that can be done that day, taking care to do each act in a successful manner.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Dwell upon your mental picture until it is clear and distinct, and then take the Mental Attitude of Ownership toward everything in that picture.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: By thought, the thing you want is brought to you; by action you receive it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: In order to do this, man must pass from the competitive to the creative mind; he must form a clear mental picture of the things he wants, and do, with faith and purpose, all that can be done each day, doing each separate thing in an efficient manner.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You are not kept poor by lack in the supply of riches; it is a fact which I shall demonstrate a little farther on that even the resources of the Formless Supply are at the command of the man or woman will act and think in a Certain Way.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Some degree of ability to think and understand is, of course, essential; but in so far natural ability is concerned, any man or woman who has sense enough to read and understand these words can certainly get rich.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: When you enter upon the creative plane of thought you will rise above all these things and become a citizen of another kingdom.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The man who is certain to advance is the one who is too big for his place, and who has a clear concept of what he wants to be; who knows that he can become what he wants to be and who is determined to BE what he wants to be.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: He must give to every man a use value in excess of the cash value he receives, so that each transaction makes for more life; and he must so hold the Advancing Thought that the impression of increase will be communicated to all with whom he comes in contact.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: That he may receive what he wants when it comes, man must act NOW upon the people and things in his present environment.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: God wants those who can play music to have pianos and every other instrument, and to have the means to cultivate their talents to the fullest extent; He wants those who can appreciate beauty to be able to surround themselves with beautiful things; He wants those who can discern truth to have every opportunity to travel and observe; He wants those who can appreciate dress to be beautifully clothed, and those who can appreciate good food to be luxuriously fed.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You can get into the business you want by making constructive use of the business you are already established in; by doing your daily work in a Certain Way.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Hold the faith and purpose of increase during work hours, after work hours, and before work hours.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Others are poor because, while they feel that there is a way out, they are too intellectually indolent to put forth the mental effort necessary to find that way and by travel it; and for these the very best thing you can do is to arouse their desire by showing them the happiness that comes from being rightly rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The desire for riches is simply the capacity for larger life seeking fulfillment; every desire is the effort of an unexpressed possibility to come into action.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Your vision of the right business, if held with faith and purpose, will cause the Supreme to move the right business toward you; and your action, if performed in the Certain Way, will cause you to move toward the business.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The universe desires you to have everything you want to have.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It will be EASIER for you to succeed in a vocation for which you already have the talents in a well-developed state; but you CAN succeed in any vocation, for you can develop any rudimentary talent, and there is no talent of which you have not at least the rudiment.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You can do what you want to do, and it is your right and privilege to follow the business or avocation which will be most congenial and pleasant.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You may be the poorest man on the continent, and be deeply in debt; you may have neither friends, influence, nor resources; but if you begin to do things in this way, you must infallibly begin to get rich, for like causes must produce like effects.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: All things else being equal, it is best to select the business for which you have the best developed talent; but if you have a strong desire to engage in any particular line of work, you should select that work as the ultimate end at which you aim.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Fall back on the contemplation of your vision, and increase your faith and purpose; and by all means, in times of doubt and indecision, cultivate gratitude.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If anybody else in your town can get rich, so can you; and if anybody else in your state can get rich, so can you.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: In following the Certain Way as described in the foregoing pages, you are getting continuous increase for yourself, and you are giving it to all with whom you deal.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: This is the gospel that the world needs; it will give increase of life, and men will hear it gladly, and will give liberal support to the man who brings it to them.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Every act can be made strong and efficient by holding your vision while you are doing it, and putting the whole power of your FAITH and PURPOSE into it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If it is a new thought to you that gratitude brings your whole mind into closer harmony with the creative energies of the universe, consider it well, and you will see that it is true.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Men will be attracted to you, and if there is no possibility for advancement in your present job, you will very soon see an opportunity to take another job.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: And behind this purpose must be an invincible and unwavering FAITH that the thing is already yours; that it is "at hand" and you have only to take possession of it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: First, you believe that there is one Intelligent Substance, from which all things proceed; second, you believe that this Substance gives you everything you desire; and third, you relate yourself to it by a feeling of deep and profound gratitude.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is not your part to guide or supervise the creative process; all you have to do with that is to retain your vision, stick to your purpose, and maintain your faith and gratitude.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You will become so enthused with its bright promises that the mere thought of it will call forth the strongest energies of your whole being.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: No man or woman who obeys the law can fail to get rich, any more than one can multiply two by two and fail to get four.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: To do things in a way you want to do them, you will have to acquire the ability to think the way you want to think; this is the first step toward getting rich.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You can serve God and man in no more effective way than by getting rich; that is, if you get rich by the creative method and not by the competitive one.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: That is the way every seeming failure will work out for you, if you keep your faith, hold to your purpose, have gratitude, and do, every day, all that can be done that day, doing each separate act in a successful manner.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Your part is to intelligently formulate your desire for the things which make for a larger life, and to get these desire arranged into a coherent whole; and then to impress this Whole Desire upon the Formless Substance, which has the power and the will to bring you what you want.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The desire of Thinking Substance for fuller life and better living has caused the creation of all the sewing machines already made; and it can cause the creation of millions more, and will, whenever men set it in motion by desire and faith, and by acting in a Certain Way.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You must have it before you can give it; and many people fail to impress Thinking Substance because they have themselves only a vague and misty concept of the things they want to do, to have, or to become.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: To look upon the appearances of poverty will produce corresponding forms in your own mind, unless you hold to the truth that there is no poverty; there is only abundance.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: See the things you want as if they were actually around you all the time; see yourself as owning and using them.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Put poverty and all things that pertain to poverty completely behind you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Since belief is all important, it behooves you to guard your thoughts; and as your beliefs will be shaped to a very great extent by the things you observe and think about, it is important that you should command your attention.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Increase is what all men and all women are seeking; it is the urge of the Formless Intelligence within them, seeking fuller expression.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Hold the vision of yourself in the right business, with the purpose to get into it, and the faith that you will get into it, and are getting into it; but ACT in your present business.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Every action is either strong or weak; and when every one is strong, you are acting in the Certain Way which will make you rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If you are now in business, and anybody else in your locality is getting rich in the same business, while you are not getting rich, it is because you are not doing things in the same Way that the other person is doing them.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: No man should regard his vocation as being irrevocably fixed by the tendencies with which he was born.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You can get rich in ANY business, for if you have not the right talent for you can develop that talent; it merely means that you will have to make your tools as you go along, instead of confining yourself to the use of those with which you were born.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Such opportunities will speedily come, for the Supreme, working in All, and working for you, will bring them before you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If you go on as I have directed, you will develop all the talent that is necessary to the doing of your work.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Spend as much of your leisure time as you can in contemplating your picture, but no one needs to take exercises to concentrate his mind on a thing which he really wants; it is the things you do not really care about which require effort to fix your attention upon them.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Never speak of the times as being hard, or of business conditions as being doubtful.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Do not wait for an opportunity to be all that you want to be; when an opportunity to be more than you are now is presented and you feel impelled toward it, take it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: And it is certain that you can do what you want to do; the desire to do it is proof that you have within you the power which can do it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Then we must grasp the truth that every thought held in this substance becomes a form, and that man can so impress his thoughts upon it as to cause them to take form and become visible things.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Behind your clear vision must be the purpose to realize it; to bring it out in tangible expression.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: By thought you can cause the gold in the hearts of the mountains to be impelled toward you; but it will not mine itself, refine itself, coin itself into double eagles, and come rolling along the roads seeking its way into your pocket.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Whatever your action is to be, it is evident that you must act NOW.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: A man's highest happiness is found in the bestowal of benefits on those he loves; love finds its most natural and spontaneous expression in giving.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Health is never to be attained by studying disease and thinking about disease; righteousness is not to be promoted by studying sin and thinking about sin; and no one ever got rich by studying poverty and thinking about poverty.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is therefore of supreme importance to him that he should be rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: A day or two spent in contemplating the vision of what you want, and in earnest thanksgiving that you are getting it, will bring your mind into such close relationship with the Supreme that you will make no mistake when you do act.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The grateful mind continually expects good things, and expectation becomes faith.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Gratitude will lead your mind out along the ways by which things come; and it will keep you in close harmony with creative thought and prevent you from falling into competitive thought.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You must form a clear and definite mental picture of what you want; you cannot transmit an idea unless you have it yourself.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: People will go where they are given increase; and the Supreme, which desires increase in all, and which knows all, will move toward you men and women who have never heard of you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: But remember that your thought must be held upon the creative plane; you are never for an instant to be betrayed into regarding the supply as limited, or into acting on the moral level of competition.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: He will get rich; he will cause the creation of whatsoever he wants.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Times may be hard and business doubtful for those who are on the competitive plane, but they can never be so for you; you can create what you want, and you are above fear.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The very best thing you can do for the whole world is to make the most of yourself.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: And finally, because you are to cause the creation of your riches from Formless Substance which permeates all your environment, it does not follow that they are to take shape from the atmosphere and come into being before your eyes.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Man can form things in his thought, and, by impressing his thought upon formless substance, can cause the thing he thinks about to be created.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Use your will power to keep your mind OFF the subject of poverty, and to keep it fixed with faith and purpose ON the vision of what you want.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The minds of people, everywhere, are influenced toward doing the things necessary to the fulfilling of your desires; and they work for you, unconsciously.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: When two men are in the same locality, and in the same business, and one gets rich while the other remains poor, it shows that getting rich is not, primarily, a matter of environment.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: This is the crucial point in the science of getting rich; right here, where thought and personal action must be combined.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It will be the first step toward a greater opportunity.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The desire for riches is really the desire for a richer, fuller, and more abundant life; and that desire is praise worthy.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Desire is a manifestation of power.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Being a consciously living substance, It must have the nature and inherent desire of every living intelligence for increase of life.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: A seed, dropped into the ground, springs into activity, and in the act of living produces a hundred more seeds; life, by living, multiplies itself.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Do no tell of the poverty of your parents, or the hardships of your early life; to do any of these things is to mentally class yourself with the poor for the time being, and it will certainly check the movement of things in your direction.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You are to become a creator, not a competitor; you are going to get what you want, but in such a way that when you get it every other man will have more than he has now.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The science of getting rich begins with the absolute acceptance of this faith.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: He who masters the details of the science of getting rich, together with the allied sciences of being well, of being great, and of winning love, and who teaches these details from the pulpit, will never lack for a congregation.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Some people remain in poverty because they are ignorant of the fact that there is wealth for them; and these can best be taught by showing them the way to affluence in your own person and practice.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: But if ALL Power goes into every act, no matter how commonplace, every act will be a success in itself; and as in the nature of things every success opens the way to other successes, your progress toward what you want, and the progress of what you want toward you, will become increasingly rapid.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The methods herein set forth are for people whose desire for riches is strong enough to overcome mental laziness and the love of ease, and make them work.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: In the mental realm, enter at once into full enjoyment of the things you want.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: KNOW that the money you need will come, even if it is necessary for a thousand men to be led to the discovery of new gold mines to-morrow.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You cannot give every man more in cash market value than you take from him, but you can give him more in use value than the cash value of the thing you take from him.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: KNOW that there are countless millions of dollars' worth of gold in the mountains of the earth, not yet brought to light; and know that if there were not, more would be created from Thinking Substance to supply your needs.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Life has advanced so far, and become so complex, that even the most ordinary man or woman requires a great amount of wealth in order to live in a manner that even approaches completeness.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Holding the whole picture in his mind, he began living in the Certain Way, and moving toward what he wanted; and he owns the house now, and is rebuilding it after the form of his mental image.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: There are very many people who, consciously or unconsciously, set the creative forces in action by the strength and persistence of their desires, but who remain poor because they do not provide for the reception of the thing they want when it comes.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Never look at the visible supply; look always at the limitless riches in Formless Substance, and KNOW that they are coming to you as fast as you can receive and use them.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Give your attention wholly to riches; ignore poverty.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The more gratefully we fix our minds on the Supreme when good things come to us, the more good things we will receive, and the more rapidly they will come; and the reason simply is that the mental attitude of gratitude draws the mind into closer touch with the source from which the blessings come.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: No matter how poor you may be, if you begin to do things in the Certain Way you will begin to get rich; and you will begin to have capital.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Feel that you are getting rich, and that in so doing you are making others rich, and conferring benefits on all.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If you want to help the poor, demonstrate to them that they can become rich; prove it by getting rich yourself.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Substance is friendly to you, and is more anxious to give you what you want than you are to get it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: This power can only be acquired by getting hold of the basic fact which is behind all appearances; and that fact is that there is one Thinking Substance, from which and by which all things are made.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Go on in the certain way, and if you do not receive that thing, you will receive something so much better that you will see that the seeming failure was really a great success.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: When all the gold and silver has been dug from the earth, if man is still in such a stage of social development that he needs gold and silver, more will produced from the Formless.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The exercise of GRATITUDE will never fail to strengthen your faith and renew your purpose.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The paper, ink, and other material in this book may not be worth the money you pay for it; but if the ideas suggested by it bring you thousands of dollars, you have not been wronged by those who sold it to you; they have given you a great use value for a small cash value.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Mind, however, that you do not do this as a mere dreamer and castle builder; hold to the FAITH that the imaginary is being realized, and to the PURPOSE to realize it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: He must keep in mind the Purpose to get rich through the realization of his mental image.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: In this book, I shall not speak of riches in a figurative way; to be really rich does not mean to be satisfied or contented with a little.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: On the competitive plane, the struggle to get rich is a Godless scramble for power over other men; but when we come into the creative mind, all this is changed.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: He who has no feeling of gratitude cannot long retain a living faith; and without a living faith you cannot get rich by the creative method, as we shall see in the following chapters.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is the natural and inherent impulse of life to seek to live more; it is the nature of intelligence to enlarge itself, and of consciousness to seek to extend its boundaries and find fuller expression.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You have accepted a certain theory of the universe as being correct, and are resting all your hopes of happiness on its being correct; and what can you gain by giving heed to conflicting theories?
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If you wish speedy results, spend practically all your spare time in this practice.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is probable that your actions, at least for some time to come, will be those you have been performing for some time past; but you are to begin now to perform these actions in the Certain Way, which will surely make you rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: They hold to so much of this erroneous thought that they feel ashamed to ask for wealth; they try not to want more than a very modest competence, just enough to make them fairly comfortable.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Do not spend any time in daydreaming or castle building; hold to the one vision of what you want, and act NOW.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Man may come into full harmony with the Formless Substance by entertaining a lively and sincere gratitude for the blessings it bestows upon him.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The economic salvation of the masses can only be accomplished by getting a large number of people to practice the scientific method set down in this book, and become rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Since the desire for more life is inherent in all things, when a man begins to move toward larger life more things attach themselves to him, and the influence of his desire is multiplied.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The law is exactly the same for you; your getting rich depends upon your applying this principle to your own affairs.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is forever Becoming More; it must do so, if it continues to be at all.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: I have said that men get rich by doing things in a Certain Way; and in order to do so, men must become able to think in a certain way.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The action of thought in getting rich is fully explained in the preceding chapters; your faith and purpose positively impress your vision upon Formless Substance, which has THE SAME DESIRE FOR MORE LIFE THAT YOU HAVE; and this vision, received from you, sets all the creative forces at work IN AND THROUGH THEIR REGULAR CHANNELS OF ACTION, but directed toward you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Do, every day, ALL that can be done that day.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If, now, it is possible for you to make each act an efficient one, you see again that the getting of riches is reduced to an exact science, like mathematics.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The One Substance desires to live more in you; hence it wants you to have all the things you can use.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You do not make this impression by repeating strings of words; you make it by holding the vision with unshakable PURPOSE to attain it, and with steadfast FAITH that you do attain it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: That is the legitimate use of the will in getting what you want-to use it in holding yourself to the right course.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Thinking Substance takes the form of its thought, and moves according to the thought.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Every thought we think makes it necessary for us to think another thought; consciousness is continually expanding.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: When others are having hard times and poor business, you will find your greatest opportunities.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: That the above statement is true is shown by the following facts: Getting rich is not a matter of environment, for, if it were, all the people in certain neighborhoods would become wealthy; the people of one city would all be rich, while those of other towns would all be poor; or the inhabitants of one state would roll in wealth, while those of an adjoining state would be in poverty.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: No man can rise to his greatest possible height in talent or soul development unless he has plenty of money; for to unfold the soul and to develop talent he must have many things to use, and he cannot have these things unless he has money to buy them with.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: In order to know more, do more, and be more we must have more; we must have things to use, for we learn, and do, and become, only by using things.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The world is advanced only by those who more than fill their present places.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Nature is an inexhaustible storehouse of riches; the supply will never run short.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: "Whatsoever things ye ask for when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them," said Jesus.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Every man has the natural and inherent power to think what he wants to think, but it requires far more effort to do so than it does to think the thoughts which are suggested by appearances.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You do not need to let any man work for you for less than he earns.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You cannot act where you are not; you cannot act where you have been, and you cannot act where you are going to be; you can act only where you are.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Contemplate your picture in your leisure hours until your consciousness is so full of it that you can grasp it instantly.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You can convey this impression by holding the unshakable faith that you, yourself, are in the Way of Increase; and by letting this faith inspire, fill, and permeate every action.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You are concerned with doing today' work in a perfectly successful manner, and not with emergencies which may arise tomorrow; you can attend to them as they come.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: We live in a thought world, which is part of a thought universe.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Every hour and moment you spend in giving heed to doubts and fears, every hour you spend in worry, every hour in which your soul is possessed by unbelief, sets a current away from you in the whole domain of intelligent Substance.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: All that there is of possibility is seeking expression through men.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If everyday is a failure, you can never get rich; while if every day is a success, you cannot fail to get rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If your heart is set on domestic happiness, remember that love flourishes best where there is refinement, a high level of thought, and freedom from corrupting influences; and these are to be found only where riches are attained by the exercise of creative thought, without strife or rivalry.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The more men who get rich on the competitive plane, the worse for others; the more who get rich on the creative plane, the better for others.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Always speak in terms of advancement; to do otherwise is to deny your faith, and to deny your faith is to lose it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is essential, however that your purpose should harmonize with the purpose that is in All.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: He has use for the gun; it will get him many more furs and much food; it will add to his life in every way; it will make him rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Use your present business as the means of getting a better one, and use your present environment as the means of getting into a better one.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If there is something that may be done today, and you do not do it, you have failed in so far as that thing is concerned; and the consequences may be more disastrous than you imagine.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: On the other hand, to fix your attention on the best is to surround yourself with the best, and to become the best.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Everything is naturally for you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Live in the new house; wear the fine clothes; ride in the automobile; go on the journey, and confidently plan for greater journeys.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: No better statement of the principle of creative action can be formulated than the favorite declaration of the late "Golden Rule" Jones of Toledo: "What I want for myself, I want for everybody."
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: To think according to appearance is easy; to think truth regardless of appearances is laborious, and requires the expenditure of more power than any other work man is called upon to perform.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You can aim at nothing so great or noble, I repeat, as to become rich; and you must fix your attention upon your mental picture of riches, to the exclusion of all that may tend to dim or obscure the vision.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Doubt or unbelief is as certain to start a movement away from you as faith and purpose are to start one toward you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: All that is possible in the way of greatness and soul unfoldment, of service and lofty endeavor, comes by way of getting rich; all is made possible by the use of things.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Go on in full faith.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Generally speaking, you will do best in that business which will use your strongest faculties; the one for which you are naturally "best fitted."
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Power is at your service; and to make each act efficient you have only to put power into it.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: He cannot live fully in mind without books and time to study them, without opportunity for travel and observation, or without intellectual companionship.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Moral and spiritual greatness is possible only to those who are above the competitive battle for existence; and only those who are becoming rich on the plane of creative thought are free from the degrading influences of competition.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: When you know what to think and do, then you must use your will to compel yourself to think and do the right things.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: And if your gratitude is strong and constant, the reaction in Formless Substance will be strong and continuous; the movement of the things you want will be always toward you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You will not fail because you lack the necessary talent to do what you wish to do.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: That which makes you want more money is the same as that which makes the plant grow; it is Life, seeking fuller expression.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Original Substance is alive with creative energy, and is constantly producing more forms.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: To permit your mind to dwell upon the inferior is to become inferior and to surround yourself with inferior things.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Hold it in such a way that every person who comes in contact with you, whether foreman, fellow workman, or social acquaintance, will feel the power of purpose radiating from you; so that every one will get the sense of advancement and increase from you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: He went through the house in which he lived, and planned all the improvements he would like to make in it; he mentally added a bay window here and a room there, until it was complete in his mind as his ideal home; and then he planned its furnishings.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: People must be taught to become rich by creation, not by competition.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If getting rich is the result of doing things in a Certain Way, and if like causes always produce like effects, then any man or woman who can do things in that way can become rich, and the whole matter is brought within the domain of exact science.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Oral prayer is well enough, and has its effect, especially upon yourself, in clarifying your vision and strengthening your faith; but it is not your oral petitions which get you what you want.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You do not have to covet the property of others, or to look at it with wishful eyes; no man has anything of which you cannot have the like, and that without taking what he has away from him.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is perfectly right that you should give your best attention to the Science of Getting Rich, for it is the noblest and most necessary of all studies.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: This is true of man collectively; the race as a whole is always abundantly rich, and if individuals are poor, it is because they do not follow the Certain Way of doing things which makes the individual man rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Get rich; that is the best way you can help the poor.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: No one else is going to beat you to the thing you want to do; there is enough for all.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The stuff from which all things are made is a substance which thinks, and a thought of form in this substance produces the form.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The combined mental and personal action I have described is infallible; it cannot fail.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Do not try to more than fill your present place with a view to pleasing your employer; do it with the idea of advancing yourself.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: And any teacher who has this faith and purpose can give it to his pupils; he cannot help giving it to them if it is part of his own life and practice.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The more steady and continuous your faith and purpose, the more rapidly you will get rich, because you will make only POSITIVE impressions upon Substance; and you will not neutralize or offset them by negative impressions.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: People get rich in every business, and in every profession; while their next door neighbors in the same vocation remain in poverty.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Where there is no power, either developed or undeveloped, to do a thing, there is never any desire to do that thing; and where there is strong desire to do a thing, it is certain proof that the power to do it is strong, and only requires to be developed and applied in the Right Way.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If you live in Maine, it may be that a man will be brought from Texas or Japan to engage in some transaction which will result in your getting what you want.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: One man can take a sharp saw, a square, a good plane, and so on, and build a handsome article of furniture; another man can take the same tools and set to work to duplicate the article, but his production will be a botch.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: No one is prevented from getting rich by lack of capital.
Chapter Title: There is A Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The science of getting rich does not require you to apply power or force to any other person, in any way whatsoever.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: We propose to prove that he may do so; to prove that any man or woman may do so, and to show how.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Every living thing is under this necessity for continuous advancement; where increase of life ceases, dissolution and death set in at once.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The man who can sincerely thank God for the things which as yet he owns only in imagination, has real faith.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If you cannot get rich working for the steel trust, you can get rich on a ten-acre farm; and if you begin to move in the Certain Way, you will certainly escape from the "clutches" of the steel trust and get on to the farm or wherever else you wish to be.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Man cannot live fully in body without good food, comfortable clothing, and warm shelter; and without freedom from excessive toil.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Think of the riches the world is coming into, instead of the poverty it is growing out of; and bear in mind that the only way in which you can assist the world in growing rich is by growing rich yourself through the creative method-not the competitive one.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is not necessary to take exercises in concentration, nor to set apart special times for prayer and affirmation, nor to "go into the silence," nor to do occult stunts of any kind.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Man reshapes and modifies existing forms by manual labor; he has given no attention to the question whether he may not produce things from Formless Substance by communicating his thoughts to it.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You do not want to get rich solely for the good of others, to lose yourself for the salvation of mankind, to experience the joys of philanthropy and sacrifice.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: "it is God that worketh in you to will and to do," said Paul.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is not enough that you should have a general desire for wealth "to do good with"; everybody has that desire.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: In a few weeks an opportunity so much better came his way that he would not have made the first deal on any account; and he saw that a Mind which knew more than he knew had prevented him from losing the greater good by entangling himself with the lesser.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The desire you feel for riches is the infinite, seeking to express Himself in you as He sought to find expression in the little boy at the piano.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Do not concern yourself with questions as to how you shall surmount obstacles which may loom upon your business horizon, unless you can see plainly that your course must be altered today in order to avoid them.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: A man's way of doing things is the direct result of the way he thinks about things.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Do not wait for a change of environment, before you act; get a change of environment by action.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Do all that you can do in a perfect manner every day, but do it without haste, worry, or fear.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: For this cause, everything which can possibly minister to life is bountifully provided; there can be no lack unless God is to contradict himself and nullify his own works.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is in the use of material things that a man finds full life for his body, develops his mind, and unfolds his soul.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Put poverty behind you, and put all that pertains to it behind you, and "make good."
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The Intelligent Substance which is All, and in All, and which lives in All and lives in you, is a consciously Living Substance.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Only those who are emancipated from financial worry, and who have the means to live a care-free existence and follow hygienic practices, can have and retain health.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You will get rich most easily in point of effort, if you do that for which you are best fitted; but you will get rich most satisfactorily if you do that which you WANT to do.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is power seeking to manifest which causes desire.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You can so conduct your business that it will be a sort of ladder, by which every employee who will take the trouble may climb to riches himself; and given the opportunity, if he will not do so it is not your fault.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is necessary, then, to cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you; and to give thanks continuously.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: If there are past mistakes whose consequences have placed you in an undesirable business or environment, you may be obliged for some time to do what you do not like to do; but you can make the doing of it pleasant by knowing that it is making it possible for you to come to the doing of what you want to do.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: The poor do not need charity; they need inspiration.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: There is nothing in your circumstances or in the industrial situation that can keep you down.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Your vision and faith will set the creative force in motion to bring it toward you, and your action will cause the forces in your own environment to move you toward the place you want.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: It is perfectly right that you should desire to be rich; if you are a normal man or woman you cannot help doing so.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Also, faith is born of gratitude.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: That cannot possibly happen; you are not seeking any thing that is possessed by anybody else; you are causing what you want to be created from formless Substance, and the supply is without limits.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Man instinctively knows this, and hence he is forever seeking more.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: And in so far as your business consists in dealing with other men, whether personally or by letter, the keythought of all your efforts must be to convey to their minds the impression of increase.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Do everything that you do in the firm conviction that you are an advancing personality, and that you are giving advancement to everybody.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: No matter whether you are a physician, a teacher, or a clergyman, if you can give increase of life to others and make them sensible of the fact, they will be attracted to you, and you will get rich.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: All the forms that man fashions with his hands must first exist in his thought; he cannot shape a thing until he has thought that thing.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: He is saying "I want hands to build wonderful structures, to play divine harmonies, to paint glorious pictures; I want feet to run my errands, eyes to see my beauties, tongues to tell mighty truths and to sing marvelous songs," and so on.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: After once forming the thought, have the most absolute and unquestioning faith that the sewing machine is coming; never think of it, or speak, of it, in any other way than as being sure to arrive.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: To secure this harmonious relation is a matter of such primary and vital importance that I shall give some space to its discussion here, and give you instructions which, if you will follow them, will be certain to bring you into perfect unity of mind with God.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: And unless you really want to get rich, so that the desire is strong enough to hold your thoughts directed to the purpose as the magnetic pole holds the needle of the compass, it will hardly be worth while for you to try to carry out the instructions given in this book.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Under the impelling power of the Supreme Spirit, men' s affairs will be so ordered that someone will be led to mine the gold for you; other men' s business transactions will be so directed that the gold will be brought toward you, and you must so arrange your own business affairs that you may be able to receive it when it comes to you.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: You are not to take it as charity, nor to steal it; you must give every man more in use value than he gives you in cash value.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: No man, therefore, is poor because nature is poor, or because there is not enough to go around.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Reasoning back from the phenomena of form and thought, I come to one original thinking substance; and reasoning forward from this thinking substance, I come to man's power to cause the formation of the thing he thinks about.
Chapter Title: The First Principle in The Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: This is the process by which the impression is given to the Formless, and the creative forces set in motion.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: There are three motives for which we live; we live for the body, we live for the mind, we live for the soul.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: In order to receive his own when it shall come to him, man must be active; and this activity can only consist in more than filling his present place.
Chapter Title: Summary of the Science of Getting Rich
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: Because you are not in the right business, or the right environment now, do not think that you must postpone action until you get into the right business or environment.
Author: WALLACE D. WATTLES

Quote: To live fully in mind he must have intellectual recreations, and must surround himself with all the objects of art and beauty he is capable of using and appreciating.
